00014 #include "entrylistconnector.h"
00015 #include "analyzer.h"

00024 
00025 XEntryListConnector::XEntryListConnector
00026 (const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &node, QTable *item, const shared_ptr<XChartList> &chartlist)
00027     : XListQConnector(node, item),
00028       m_chartList(chartlist)
00029 {
00030     connect(item, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )),
00031             this, SLOT(clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )) );
00032     m_pItem->setNumCols(4);
00033     const double def = 50;
00034     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 2.5));
00035     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 2.0));
00036     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 0.8));
00037     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(3, (int)(def * 2.5));
00038     QStringList labels;
00039     labels += KAME::i18n("Entry");
00040     labels += KAME::i18n("Value");
00041     labels += KAME::i18n("Store");
00042     labels += KAME::i18n("Delta");
00043     m_pItem->setColumnLabels(labels);
00044   
00045     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00046     if(list) {
00047         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++)
00048             onCatch(*it);
00049     }
00050 }
00051 void
00052 XEntryListConnector::onRecord(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver)
00053 {
00054     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end(); it++)
00055     {
00056         if((*it)->entry->driver() == driver)
00057         {
00058             tcons::tlisttext text;
00059             text.label = (*it)->label;
00060             text.str.reset(new std::string((*it)->entry->value()->to_str()));
00061             (*it)->tlkOnRecordRedirected->talk(text);
00062         }
00063     }
00064 }
00065 void
00066 XEntryListConnector::tcons::onRecordRedirected(const tlisttext &text)
00067 {
00068     text.label->setText(*text.str);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void
00072 XEntryListConnector::clicked ( int row, int col, int, const QPoint& ) {
00073     switch(col) {
00074     case 0:
00075     case 1:
00076     {
00077         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_chartList->children());
00078         if(list) {
00079             if((row >= 0) && (row < (int)list->size())) {
00080                 dynamic_pointer_cast<XValChart>(list->at(row))->showChart();
00081             }
00082         }
00083     }
00084     break;
00085     default:
00086         break;
00087     }
00088 }
00089 void
00090 XEntryListConnector::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00091 {
00092     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end();)
00093     {
00094         ASSERT(m_pItem->numRows() == (int)m_cons.size());
00095         if((*it)->entry == node)
00096         {
00097             (*it)->driver->onRecord().disconnect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00098             for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->numRows(); i++)
00099             {
00100                 if(m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1) == (*it)->label) m_pItem->removeRow(i);
00101             }
00102             it = m_cons.erase(it);
00103         }
00104         else
00105         {
00106             it++;
00107         }
00108     }
00109 }
00110 void
00111 XEntryListConnector::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00112 {
00113     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(node);
00114     int i = m_pItem->numRows();
00115     m_pItem->insertRows(i);
00116     m_pItem->setText(i, 0, entry->getLabel());
00117 
00118     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = entry->driver();
00119     if(m_lsnOnRecord)
00120         driver->onRecord().connect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00121     else
00122         m_lsnOnRecord = driver->onRecord().connectWeak(
00123             shared_from_this(), &XEntryListConnector::onRecord);
00124 
00125     m_cons.push_back(shared_ptr<tcons>(new tcons));
00126     m_cons.back()->entry = entry;
00127     m_cons.back()->label = new QLabel(m_pItem);
00128     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 1, m_cons.back()->label);
00129     QCheckBox *ckbStore = new QCheckBox(m_pItem);
00130     m_cons.back()->constore = xqcon_create<XQToggleButtonConnector>(entry->store(), ckbStore);
00131     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 2, ckbStore);
00132     KDoubleSpinBox *numDelta = new KDoubleSpinBox(-1, 1e4, 1, 0, 5, m_pItem);
00133     m_cons.back()->condelta = xqcon_create<XKDoubleSpinBoxConnector>(entry->delta(), numDelta);
00134     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 3, numDelta);
00135     m_cons.back()->driver = driver;
00136     m_cons.back()->tlkOnRecordRedirected.reset(new XTalker<tcons::tlisttext>);
00137     m_cons.back()->lsnOnRecordRedirected = m_cons.back()->tlkOnRecordRedirected->connectWeak(
00138         m_cons.back(), &XEntryListConnector::tcons::onRecordRedirected,
00139         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00140   
00141 
00142     ASSERT(m_pItem->numRows() == (int)m_cons.size());
00143 }
